head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DRIGGS, ADRIAN P.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DRIGGS, ADRIAN P.

block.p: DRIGGS-Adrian P. Age 84, died in Naples, FL, September 9, 2000. Loving husband of June & the late Patricia Heffernan Driggs. Loving father of Patricia Driggs Balassi & Adrian P. Driggs, III. Brother of Katherine Purcell; grandfather of John Christopher & Kathryn Balassi. Resident of Naples, FL; formerly of Fayetteville, Brooklyn, & Point Lookout, NY. General counsel to Agway; staff counsel to Lever Brothers; graduate of Brooklyn Prepatory School, 1934. College of the Holy Cross, 1938; and St. John's Law School. In lieu of flowers, contributions to St. Elizabeth Seton, RC Church, Naples, FL.
